<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <title>Register your interest</title>
  <!-- Bootstrap CSS -->
  <!-- CSS only -->
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-KyZXEAg3QhqLMpG8r+8fhAXLRk2vvoC2f3B09zVXn8CA5QIVfZOJ3BCsw2P0p/We" crossorigin="anonymous">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <style>

    html {
      height: 100%;
      min-height: 100%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      font-size: 20px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 760px){
      html {
        font-size: 18px !important;
      }
    }

    body {
      min-height: 100%;
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      color: #404040;
      background-color: #FFFFFF;
      line-height: 1.5;
      margin: 0px;
    }

    .logo svg {
      max-height: 55px;
    }

    .customerinfo {
      display: block;
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: bold;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
    }

    input:hover, input:focus, input:active {
      background-color: #FFFFFF;
      border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
      outline: none;
    }

      .answer_box
        {
          width: 420px;
          height: 58px;
          padding: 14px;
          color: #404040;
          border: 1px solid #D3D3D3;
          margin-bottom: 0.2rem;
          background-color: #FFFFFF;
        }
        .answer_box input {
          width: 320px;
          height: 32px;
          padding: 14px;
          color: #404040;
          border: 1px solid #0097BB;
          margin-bottom: 4px;
          background-color: #F9F9F9;
        }

      #header {
       background-color: #FFFFFF;
      }

      #banner {
       background-color: #F9F9F9;
      }

      #questionnaire_banner {
       width: 100%;
       background-color: #F9F9F9;
      }

      #questionnaire {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 620px;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 1.476rem 1.476rem;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        background-color: #F9F9F9
      }

      @media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
        #questionnaire_banner {
          padding-left: 0rem;
          padding-right: 0rem;
        }
      }

/* Radio Buttons */

/* Customize the label (the container) */
    .radiobox {
      display: flex;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      margin-top: 1rem;
      margin-right: 1rem;

    }
    .answer_container_radio {
      display: inline;
      flex-direction: row;
      align-items: center;
      min-height: 30px;
      position: relative;
      padding-left: 35px;
      padding-right: 1rem;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      cursor: pointer;
      text-align: middle;
      font-size: 1rem;
      -webkit-user-select: none;
      -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
      user-select: none;
      }

/* Hide the browser's default radio button */
    .answer_container_radio input {
      position: absolute;
      opacity: 0;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
/* Create a custom radio button */

      .checkmark_radio {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;
      }

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked ~ .checkmark_radio {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #0097bb;
        /* -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); */
      }

      /* Create the indicator (the dot/circle - hidden when not checked) */
      .checkmark_radio :after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
      }

      /* Style the indicator (dot/circle) */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked  ~ .checkmark_radio:after {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 6px;
        left: 6.1px;
        width: 16.1px;
        height: 16.1px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #0097bb;
        content: '';
      }

  /* radio buttons end */

      .answer_container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
        min-height: 30px;
        /* display: block; */
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 40px;
        padding-right: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: middle;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -moz-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;
      }

      /* Hide the browser's default checkbox */
      .answer_container input {
        position: absolute;
        opacity: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      /* Create a custom checkbox */
      .checkmark {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;

      }

      /* On mouse-over, add a grey background color */
      /* .answer_container:hover input ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #ececec;
      } */

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #0097bb;
        border: 2px solid rgb(59,153,252);
      }

      /* Check mark */
      .checkmark:after {
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
        content: '';
      }

      /* Show check mark */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark:after {
        display: block;
      }

      /* Checkbox tick */
      .answer_container .checkmark:after {
        top: 4px;
        left: 8px;
        width: 9px;
        height: 12px;
        transform: rotate(45deg);
        border: solid #ffffff;
        border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
      }

      /* Disabled tick colour */
      .answer_container input:disabled ~ .checkmark:after {
        border-color: #7b7b7b;
      }

      .checkbox-error {
          border-left: 2px solid #DD1D21;
          padding-left: .460rem;
      }

      .error-message {
        color: #DD1D21;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
      }

      .button {
        background-color: #0097BB;
        border: none;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        padding: 14px 20px;
        text-align: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        font-weight: bold;
        margin-top: 0rem;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      button:hover {
        background-color: #89CFDC;
        color: black;
      }


      .button--primary:hover {
          color: #404040;
          border-color: #89cfdc;
          background-color: #89cfdc;

        }

      .banner_copy {
       color: #404040;
       line-height: 30px;
       width: 540px;
       text-align: left;
       display: block;
       margin-block-start: 0em;
       margin-block-end: 0em;
       margin-inline-start: 0px;
       margin-inline-end: 0px;
      }

      .question {
        color: #0097BB;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-size: 2rem;
        line-height: 1.3;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
      }

      .title {
        color: #0097BB;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-size: 2rem;
        line-height: 120%;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .form-checkbox {
       margin-bottom: 1rem !important;
       display: block;
      }

      .form-paragraph {
       margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       display: block;
      }

      .form-checkbox.error {
        padding-left: .459rem;
        border-left: 2px solid #DD1D21;
      }

      .form-tick-box {
       margin-top: 1rem;
        margin-bottom: 2rem;
       display: block;
      }

      .terms {
         font-size: 0.8rem;
         margin-bottom: 0rem;
         padding-bottom: 0rem:
      }

      .footer {
       display: block;
       border-top: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
       background-color: #FFFFFF;
       margin-left: auto;
       margin-right: auto;
       height: auto;
       text-align: center;
       width: auto;
       padding-top: 30px;
       padding-bottom: 30px;
       font-size: 0.9rem;
      }

      .terms a[target=_blank] {
          padding-right: 23px;
          background-image: url(https://theme.zdassets.com/theme_assets/1251968/005bc4945e41a6953e71bba2758fc27bb6593f17.svg);
          background-size: 16px;
          background-position: 100%;
          background-repeat: no-repeat;
      }
      a {
          color: #003c88;
      }

      /**************** typo style ****************/
      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
        line-height: 120%;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-weight: normal;
      }

      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p {
        margin: 0 0 1rem;
      }

      h1 {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: #0097bb;
      }

      .text-bold {
        font-weight: bold;
      }

      .text-bold {
        font-weight: bold;
      }

      .text-link {
        color: #003c88;
      }

      .text-link:hover, .text-link:active {
        color: #0a274d;
      }

      .icon-container {
        padding-left: 7px;
        white-space: nowrap;
        color: #003C88;
      }

      .optional {
        display:inline;
        font-size: 1px;
        padding-left: 0px;
        font-weight: normal;

      }
      .optional {
        display:inline;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: normal;

      }
/**************** alesrt style ****************/
        .alert-center {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 620px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 0.178rem 0;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .form-alert {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        min-height: calc(100vh - 13rem);
      }

/**************** banner style ****************/

  .visual {
    position: relative;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column-reverse;
    -ms-flex-direction: column-reverse;
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -webkit-justify-content: center;
    -ms-flex-pack: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background-color: #ffffff;
  }
  .visual__image {
    background-image: url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/9dbca33e-4b3b-47c1-b94f-3c2e427151e8.png);
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    height: 267px;
  }
  .visual__text-banner {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem 0 1.5rem 0;
    position: relative;
  }
  @media only screen and (min-width: 761px) {
    .visual__text {
      max-width: 620px;
    }

  }
  @media (min-width: 480px) {
    .visual__image {
      background-image:url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/533f6a68-1cd9-486f-b465-df25fd414934.png);
      height: 267px;
    }
  }
  @media (min-width: 900px) {
    .visual {
      height:400px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      padding-bottom: 0;
    }
    .visual__image {
      background-image: url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/2a30c69d-8b4d-4049-93e1-26035e2a42c5.png);
      height: auto;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0;
    }
    .visual__text-banner {
      width: 50vw;
      max-width: 600px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      margin-left: auto;
      padding: 1.476rem;
    }
    .visual__text-banner h3 {
      margin-bottom: 0;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .answer_box {
     margin-bottom: 1rem !important;
     display: block;
     width: 90%;
     height:90%;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 460px) {
    .answer_box {
     margin-bottom: 1rem !important;
     display: block;
     width: 100%;
     height:100%;
    }
}

      @media (max-width: 296px) {

    .answer_container_radio {
      display: block;
      }

      .radiobox {
        display: block;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        margin-right: 1rem;

    }
}

    /**************** font inclusion ****************/
    @font-face {
      font-family: ShellFutura;
      src: url(data:application/x-font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('woff');
      font-weight: 700;
      font-style: normal;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
<header id="header">
  <div class="container-lg p-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
    <div class="logo">
      <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/" aria-label="Go to the homepage">
        <svg style="min-height:45px" viewBox="0 0 285 70.2" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
          <title>Shell Energy</title>
          <path
                d="M126 9.6c-1.1-.9-2.5-1.5-4-1.5-1.1 0-2.6.7-2.6 1.9 0 1.3 1.6 1.8 2.7 2.2l1.5.5c3.2 1 5.7 2.6 5.7 6.3 0 2.3-.5 4.6-2.4 6.2-1.8 1.5-4.2 2.2-6.5 2.2-2.9 0-5.7-1-8.1-2.6l2.6-4.8c1.5 1.3 3.2 2.4 5.3 2.4 1.4 0 2.9-.7 2.9-2.3 0-1.7-2.4-2.3-3.6-2.6-3.7-1-6.2-2-6.2-6.5 0-4.7 3.3-7.7 7.9-7.7 2.3 0 5.1.7 7.2 1.9zM137.2 1.4V13h.1c1.3-1.7 2.8-2.5 5-2.5 4 0 5.9 2.6 5.9 6.6v9.5h-5.5v-8c0-1.8-.3-3.7-2.5-3.7s-2.9 1.9-2.9 3.7v8h-5.5V1.4zM167.6 19.7h-11.7c0 2.2 1.2 3.5 3.5 3.5 1.2 0 2-.4 2.6-1.4h5.3c-.9 3.7-4.4 5.4-7.9 5.4-5.2 0-9-2.9-9-8.3 0-5.2 3.5-8.3 8.6-8.3 5.4 0 8.6 3.3 8.6 8.7zm-5.2-3.2c-.3-1.5-1.6-2.5-3.1-2.5-1.6 0-2.9.9-3.3 2.5zM169.8 1.4h5.5v25.3h-5.5zM178.6 1.4h5.6v25.3h-5.6z"
                fill="#dd1d21">
          </path>
          <g fill="#0097bb">
            <path
                  d="M135.7 34h8.7l15.9 20.4h.1V34h8.7v33.3h-8.7l-15.9-20.4h-.1v20.4h-8.7zM251.8 34h10.4l6.2 9.1 6.2-9.1H285l-12.3 17.3v16H264v-16zM255.9 48.7c-.1 4.9-.4 9-3.4 13.2-3.3 4.5-8.2 6.5-13.7 6.5-10.5 0-17.8-7.1-17.8-17.6 0-10.8 7.3-17.9 18.1-17.9 6.8 0 12.1 3.1 15 9.3l-8.2 3.4c-1.2-3.2-3.7-5.3-7.2-5.3-5.7 0-8.7 5.4-8.7 10.5 0 5.2 3.1 10.4 8.8 10.4 3.8 0 6.6-1.9 7-5.8h-7.1v-6.8h17.2z">
            </path>
            <path
                  d="M212.4 53.7c4.7-.8 7.3-4.8 7.3-9.4 0-7.1-5-10.2-11.6-10.2h-12.9v7.3h8.4v-3.9l10.4 6.8-10.4 6.7v-4.1h-8.4v20.4h8.7V54.5h.1l8.2 12.8H223zM121.9 41.3v5.6h9.8v7.3h-9.8V60h10.3v7.3h-18.9V34h18.9v7.3zM181.4 41.3v5.6h9.8v7.3h-9.8V60h10.3v7.3h-18.9V34h18.9v7.3z">
            </path>
          </g>
          <path d="M33.5 67.1H15l-1.7-13.7L2 45.1c-.5-2.4-.7-4.9-.7-7.3 0-20.2 16.4-36.5 36.5-36.5 20.2 0 36.5 16.4 36.5 36.5 0 2.5-.2 4.9-.7 7.3l-11.2 8.2L60.7 67H42.1l-1.1.8c-.9.7-2.1 1-3.2 1-1.2 0-2.3-.4-3.2-1z" fill="none" stroke="#fff"
                stroke-miterlimit="40" stroke-width="2.558">
          </path>
          <path d="M33.5 67.1H15l-1.7-13.7L2 45.1c-.5-2.4-.7-4.9-.7-7.3 0-20.2 16.4-36.5 36.5-36.5 20.2 0 36.5 16.4 36.5 36.5 0 2.5-.2 4.9-.7 7.3l-11.2 8.2L60.7 67H42.1l-1.1.8c-.9.7-2.1 1-3.2 1-1.2 0-2.3-.4-3.2-1z" fill="#fbce07">
          </path>
          <path clip-rule="evenodd"
                d="M33.5 67.1H15l-1.7-13.7L2 45.1c-.5-2.4-.7-4.9-.7-7.3 0-20.2 16.4-36.5 36.5-36.5 20.2 0 36.5 16.4 36.5 36.5 0 2.5-.2 4.9-.7 7.3l-11.2 8.2L60.7 67H42.1l-1.1.8c-.9.7-2.1 1-3.2 1-1.2 0-2.3-.4-3.2-1zm.6-6.4H20.6l-1.4-10.9-11-8.1c-.3-1.3-.5-2.6-.5-3.9 0-2.2.5-4.3 1.3-6.3l19.7 19.9L9.6 27.8c.8-3.1 2.4-5.8 4.8-7.9l17.1 29.6-15.2-32.4c2-2.6 4.7-4.5 7.8-5.5l10.5 36.7L26.9 10c2.3-1.3 5-2 7.6-2 .6 0 1.1 0 1.7.1l1.6 39.7 1.6-39.7c.5 0 1.1-.1 1.7-.1 2.7 0 5.3.7 7.6 2L41 48.2l10.5-36.7c3.1 1 5.9 2.9 7.8 5.5L44.2 49.4l17.1-29.6c2.4 2.1 4 4.9 4.8 7.9L47 51.4l19.7-19.9c.9 2 1.3 4.1 1.3 6.3 0 1.3-.2 2.6-.5 3.9l-11.1 8.1L55 60.7H41.5l-2 1.5c-.5.4-1.1.6-1.7.6s-1.2-.2-1.7-.6z"
                fill="#dd1d21" fill-rule="evenodd">
          </path>
        </svg>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
  </header>
 
    
  <section class="visual">
    <div class="visual__image">
    </div>
    <div class="container-lg px-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
      <div class="visual__text-banner">
        <h1 class="">
            We'll be right back
        </h1>
          <p>
          We plan to go back to offering great fixed tariffs as soon as we can. Sign up to be first to hear about these.
          </p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
<!-- Banner section -->

<div id="questionnaire_banner">
  <div id="questionnaire" class="container-lg px-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
    <form name="formularz" id="cloudPage" name="cloudPage" action="" method="post">
      <input type="hidden" name ="billingAccountId" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="subscriberKey" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="externalAccountId" value = "">
        <!-- Form 1 -->

        <div id="form">
          <div class="form-paragraph">
          <h2 class="title">
          Register your interest
          </h2>
          <p class="">
          We’re going back to offering great fixed tariffs just as soon as we can. Register your interest here.
          </p>
            </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Firstname">
            <p class="customerinfo">First name</p>
            <input name="Firstname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your first name">
            <span id="FirstNameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid first name</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Surname">
            <p class="customerinfo">Last name</p>
            <input name="Surname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your last name">
              <span id="SurnameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid last name</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="ContactPreference">
            <p class="customerinfo">
              How would you like to hear from us?
            </p>
            <div class="radiobox">
            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="email"  onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Email
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>

            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="phone" onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Phone call
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>
          </div>
            <span id="ContactPreferenceError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">This field is required</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Phone" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Phone</p>
            <input name="Phone" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your phone number">
            <span id="PhoneError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid phone number</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="EmailAddress" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Email address</p>
            <input name="EmailAddress" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your email address">
            <span id="EmailAddressError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid email address</span>
          </div>
          <input name="submitted" type="hidden" value="true"><br>
          <button class="button" id="Submit" type="submit" value="Submit" name="submit">Submit</button>
      <div class="terms">
        <p class="terms">
          Your email address and phone number will only be used to communicate with you regarding our current tariffs. You can unsubscribe at any time.
         
           See our  <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/terms/energy/domestic"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
        energy terms and conditions</a> and our <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/privacy"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
           privacy policy</a> for more information.
            <!-- <span class="icon-container">
              <svg width="18px" height="18px" viewBox="0 0 18 18">

    </form>
    <div id="thankYou" style="display: none;">
      Thank you for your feedback!
    </div>


    <script type="text/javascript">

  function isValidFirstname(firstname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(firstname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidSurname(surname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(surname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidEmail(email) {
    const re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
    return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidPhoneNumber(phone) {
    const re = /^[\+]?[(]?[0-9]{3}[)]?[-\s\.]?[0-9]{3}[-\s\.]?[0-9]{4,6}$/im;
    return re.test(phone);
  };

  function toggleQuestionThree() {
    var ContactPreferenceValue = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'email') {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'phone') {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

  }

  function isValidForm() {

    var ContactPreferenceObject = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceObject === null) {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var EmailAddressObject = document.querySelector('input[name="EmailAddress"]');

    if (isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var PhoneObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Phone"]');

    if (isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var FirstnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Firstname"]');

    if (isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var SurnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Surname"]');

    if (isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var validEmailCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'email' && isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === true;
    var validPhoneCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'phone' && isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === true;
    var validFirstNameCheck = isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === true;
    var validSurnameCheck = isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === true;

    if ((validEmailCheck || validPhoneCheck) && validFirstNameCheck && validSurnameCheck) {
      return true;
    }

    return false;
  }

  document.getElementById('cloudPage').onsubmit = function() {
    return isValidForm();
  };

  </script>
  </div>
</div>




<div class="footer">
   © 2010 - 2022 Shell Energy Retail Limited
</div>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE HTML>

      }

        #questionnaire_banner {

          padding-right: 0rem;
        }
      }

/* Radio Buttons */

/* Customize the label (the container) */
    .radiobox {
      display: flex;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      margin-top: 1rem;
      margin-right: 1rem;

    }
    .answer_container_radio {
      display: inline;
      flex-direction: row;
      align-items: center;
      min-height: 30px;
      position: relative;
      padding-left: 35px;
      padding-right: 1rem;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      cursor: pointer;
      text-align: middle;
      font-size: 1rem;
      -webkit-user-select: none;
      -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
      user-select: none;
      }

/* Hide the browser's default radio button */
    .answer_container_radio input {
      position: absolute;
      opacity: 0;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
/* Create a custom radio button */

      .checkmark_radio {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;
      }

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked ~ .checkmark_radio {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #0097bb;
        /* -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); */
      }

      /* Create the indicator (the dot/circle - hidden when not checked) */
      .checkmark_radio :after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
      }

      /* Style the indicator (dot/circle) */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked  ~ .checkmark_radio:after {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 6px;
        left: 6.1px;
        width: 16.1px;
        height: 16.1px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #0097bb;
        content: '';
      }

  /* radio buttons end */

      .answer_container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
        min-height: 30px;
        /* display: block; */
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 40px;
        padding-right: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: middle;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -moz-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;
      }

      /* Hide the browser's default checkbox */
      .answer_container input {
        position: absolute;
        opacity: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      /* Create a custom checkbox */
      .checkmark {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;

      }

      /* On mouse-over, add a grey background color */
      /* .answer_container:hover input ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #ececec;
      } */

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #0097bb;
        border: 2px solid rgb(59,153,252);
      }

      /* Check mark */
      .checkmark:after {
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
        content: '';
      }

      /* Show check mark */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark:after {
        display: block;
      }

      /* Checkbox tick */
      .answer_container .checkmark:after {
        top: 4px;
        left: 8px;
        width: 9px;
        height: 12px;
        transform: rotate(45deg);
        border: solid #ffffff;
        border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
      }

      /* Disabled tick colour */
      .answer_container input:disabled ~ .checkmark:after {
        border-color: #7b7b7b;
      }

                fill="#dd1d21" fill-rule="evenodd">
          </path>
        </svg>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
  </header>
 
    
  <section class="visual">
    <div class="visual__image">
    </div>
    <div class="container-lg px-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
      <div class="visual__text-banner">
        <h1 class="">
            We'll be right back
        </h1>
          <p>
          We plan to go back to offering great fixed tariffs as soon as we can. Sign up to be first to hear about these.
          </p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
<!-- Banner section -->

<div id="questionnaire_banner">
  <div id="questionnaire" class="container-lg px-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
    <form name="formularz" id="cloudPage" name="cloudPage" action="" method="post">
      <input type="hidden" name ="billingAccountId" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="subscriberKey" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="externalAccountId" value = "">
        <!-- Form 1 -->

        <div id="form">
          <div class="form-paragraph">
          <h2 class="title">
          Register your interest
          </h2>
          <p class="">
          We’re going back to offering great fixed tariffs just as soon as we can. Register your interest here.
          </p>
            </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Firstname">
            <p class="customerinfo">First name</p>
            <input name="Firstname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your first name">
            <span id="FirstNameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid first name</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Surname">
            <p class="customerinfo">Last name</p>
            <input name="Surname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your last name">
              <span id="SurnameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid last name</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="ContactPreference">
            <p class="customerinfo">
              How would you like to hear from us?
            </p>
            <div class="radiobox">
            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="email"  onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Email
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>

            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="phone" onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Phone call
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>
          </div>
            <span id="ContactPreferenceError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">This field is required</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Phone" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Phone</p>
            <input name="Phone" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your phone number">
            <span id="PhoneError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid phone number</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="EmailAddress" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Email address</p>
            <input name="EmailAddress" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your email address">
            <span id="EmailAddressError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid email address</span>
          </div>
          <input name="submitted" type="hidden" value="true"><br>
          <button class="button" id="Submit" type="submit" value="Submit" name="submit">Submit</button>
      <div class="terms">
        <p class="terms">
          Your email address and phone number will only be used to communicate with you regarding our current tariffs. You can unsubscribe at any time.
         
           See our  <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/terms/energy/domestic"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
        energy terms and conditions</a> and our <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/privacy"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
           privacy policy</a> for more information.
            <!-- <span class="icon-container">
              <svg width="18px" height="18px" viewBox="0 0 18 18">
                <g stroke="none" strokewidth="1" fillrule="evenodd">
                    <g transform="translate(-140.000000, -197.000000)">
                    <g transform="translate(140.000000, 197.000000)">
                        <g>
                        <path d="M4.9506,10.4988 C4.8306,10.4988 4.7172,10.452 4.6326,10.3668 C4.4574,10.1916 4.4574,9.906 4.6326,9.7302 L12.8646,1.4982 L9.9012,1.4982 C9.6528,1.4982 9.4512,1.2966 9.4512,1.0482 C9.4512,0.7998 9.6528,0.5982 9.9012,0.5982 L13.9512,0.5982 C14.0046,0.5982 14.0568,0.6078 14.1078,0.627 C14.1144,0.6294 14.121,0.6318 14.127,0.6342 C14.2326,0.6774 14.3214,0.7668 14.367,0.8766 C14.3688,0.8814 14.3712,0.8868 14.373,0.8922 C14.3916,0.9408 14.4012,0.9942 14.4012,1.0482 L14.4012,5.0982 C14.4012,5.3466 14.1996,5.5482 13.9512,5.5482 C13.7028,5.5482 13.5012,5.3466 13.5012,5.0982 L13.5012,2.1354 L5.2692,10.3674 C5.184,10.452 5.0706,10.4988 4.9506,10.4988 Z" id="Path"></path>
                        <path d="M1.3506,14.9988 C0.606,14.9988 0.0006,14.3934 0.0006,13.6488 L0.0006,4.6488 C0.0006,3.9042 0.606,3.2988 1.3506,3.2988 L6.7506,3.2988 C6.999,3.2988 7.2006,3.5004 7.2006,3.7488 C7.2006,3.9972 6.999,4.1988 6.7506,4.1988 L1.3506,4.1988 C1.1022,4.1988 0.9006,4.4004 0.9006,4.6488 L0.9006,13.6488 C0.9006,13.8972 1.1022,14.0988 1.3506,14.0988 L10.3506,14.0988 C10.599,14.0988 10.8006,13.8972 10.8006,13.6488 L10.8006,8.2488 C10.8006,8.0004 11.0022,7.7988 11.2506,7.7988 C11.499,7.7988 11.7006,8.0004 11.7006,8.2488 L11.7006,13.6488 C11.7006,14.3934 11.0952,14.9988 10.3506,14.9988 L1.3506,14.9988 Z" id="Path"></path>
                        </g>
                    </g>
                    </g>
                </g>
              </svg>
            </span> -->
          
        </p>
      </div>
    </form>
    <div id="thankYou" style="display: none;">
      Thank you for your feedback!
    </div>


    <script type="text/javascript">

  function isValidFirstname(firstname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(firstname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidSurname(surname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(surname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidEmail(email) {
    const re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
    return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidPhoneNumber(phone) {
    const re = /^[\+]?[(]?[0-9]{3}[)]?[-\s\.]?[0-9]{3}[-\s\.]?[0-9]{4,6}$/im;
    return re.test(phone);
  };

  function toggleQuestionThree() {
    var ContactPreferenceValue = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'email') {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'phone') {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

  }

  function isValidForm() {

    var ContactPreferenceObject = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceObject === null) {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var EmailAddressObject = document.querySelector('input[name="EmailAddress"]');

    if (isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var PhoneObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Phone"]');

    if (isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var FirstnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Firstname"]');

    if (isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var SurnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Surname"]');

    if (isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var validEmailCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'email' && isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === true;
    var validPhoneCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'phone' && isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === true;
    var validFirstNameCheck = isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === true;
    var validSurnameCheck = isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === true;

    if ((validEmailCheck || validPhoneCheck) && validFirstNameCheck && validSurnameCheck) {
      return true;
    }

    return false;
  }

  document.getElementById('cloudPage').onsubmit = function() {
    return isValidForm();
  };

  </script>
  </div>
</div>




<div class="footer">
   © 2010 - 2022 Shell Energy Retail Limited
</div>
</body>
</html>

html.content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <title>Register your interest</title>
  <!-- Bootstrap CSS -->
  <!-- CSS only -->
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-KyZXEAg3QhqLMpG8r+8fhAXLRk2vvoC2f3B09zVXn8CA5QIVfZOJ3BCsw2P0p/We" crossorigin="anonymous">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <style>

    html {
      height: 100%;
      min-height: 100%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      font-size: 20px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 760px){
      html {
        font-size: 18px !important;
      }
    }

    body {
      min-height: 100%;
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      color: #404040;
      background-color: #FFFFFF;
      line-height: 1.5;
      margin: 0px;
    }

    .logo svg {
      max-height: 55px;
    }

    .customerinfo {
      display: block;
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: bold;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
    }

    input:hover, input:focus, input:active {
      background-color: #FFFFFF;
      border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
      outline: none;
    }

      .answer_box
        {
          width: 420px;
          height: 58px;
          padding: 14px;
          color: #404040;
          border: 1px solid #D3D3D3;
          margin-bottom: 0.2rem;
          background-color: #FFFFFF;
        }
        .answer_box input {
          width: 320px;
          height: 32px;
          padding: 14px;
          color: #404040;
          border: 1px solid #0097BB;
          margin-bottom: 4px;
          background-color: #F9F9F9;
        }

      #header {
       background-color: #FFFFFF;
      }

      #banner {
       background-color: #F9F9F9;
      }

      #questionnaire_banner {
       width: 100%;
       background-color: #F9F9F9;
      }

      #questionnaire {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 620px;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 1.476rem 1.476rem;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        background-color: #F9F9F9
      }

      @media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
        #questionnaire_banner {
          padding-left: 0rem;
          padding-right: 0rem;
        }
      }

/* Radio Buttons */

/* Customize the label (the container) */
    .radiobox {
      display: flex;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      margin-top: 1rem;
      margin-right: 1rem;

    }
    .answer_container_radio {
      display: inline;
      flex-direction: row;
      align-items: center;
      min-height: 30px;
      position: relative;
      padding-left: 35px;
      padding-right: 1rem;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      cursor: pointer;
      text-align: middle;
      font-size: 1rem;
      -webkit-user-select: none;
      -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
      user-select: none;
      }

/* Hide the browser's default radio button */
    .answer_container_radio input {
      position: absolute;
      opacity: 0;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
/* Create a custom radio button */

      .checkmark_radio {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;
      }

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked ~ .checkmark_radio {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #0097bb;
        /* -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); */
      }

      /* Create the indicator (the dot/circle - hidden when not checked) */
      .checkmark_radio :after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
      }

      /* Style the indicator (dot/circle) */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked  ~ .checkmark_radio:after {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 6px;
        left: 6.1px;
        width: 16.1px;
        height: 16.1px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #0097bb;
        content: '';
      }

  /* radio buttons end */

      .answer_container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
        min-height: 30px;
        /* display: block; */
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 40px;
        padding-right: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: middle;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -moz-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;
      }

      /* Hide the browser's default checkbox */
      .answer_container input {
        position: absolute;
        opacity: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      /* Create a custom checkbox */
      .checkmark {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;

      }

      /* On mouse-over, add a grey background color */
      /* .answer_container:hover input ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #ececec;
      } */

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #0097bb;
        border: 2px solid rgb(59,153,252);
      }

      /* Check mark */
      .checkmark:after {
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
        content: '';
      }

      /* Show check mark */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark:after {
        display: block;
      }

      /* Checkbox tick */
      .answer_container .checkmark:after {
        top: 4px;
        left: 8px;
        width: 9px;
        height: 12px;
        transform: rotate(45deg);
        border: solid #ffffff;
        border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
      }

      /* Disabled tick colour */
      .answer_container input:disabled ~ .checkmark:after {
        border-color: #7b7b7b;
      }

      .checkbox-error {
          border-left: 2px solid #DD1D21;
          padding-left: .460rem;
      }

      .error-message {
        color: #DD1D21;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
      }

      .button {
        background-color: #0097BB;
        border: none;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        padding: 14px 20px;
        text-align: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        font-weight: bold;
        margin-top: 0rem;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      button:hover {
        background-color: #89CFDC;
        color: black;
      }


      .button--primary:hover {
          color: #404040;
          border-color: #89cfdc;
          background-color: #89cfdc;

        }

      .banner_copy {
       color: #404040;
       line-height: 30px;
       width: 540px;
       text-align: left;
       display: block;
       margin-block-start: 0em;
       margin-block-end: 0em;
       margin-inline-start: 0px;
       margin-inline-end: 0px;
      }

      .question {
        color: #0097BB;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-size: 2rem;
        line-height: 1.3;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
      }

      .title {
        color: #0097BB;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-size: 2rem;
        line-height: 120%;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .form-checkbox {
       margin-bottom: 1rem !important;
       display: block;
      }

      .form-paragraph {
       margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       display: block;
      }

      .form-checkbox.error {
        padding-left: .459rem;
        border-left: 2px solid #DD1D21;
      }

      .form-tick-box {
       margin-top: 1rem;
        margin-bottom: 2rem;
       display: block;
      }

      .terms {
         font-size: 0.8rem;
         margin-bottom: 0rem;
         padding-bottom: 0rem:
      }

      .footer {
       display: block;
       border-top: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
       background-color: #FFFFFF;
       margin-left: auto;
       margin-right: auto;
       height: auto;
       text-align: center;
       width: auto;
       padding-top: 30px;
       padding-bottom: 30px;
       font-size: 0.9rem;
      }

      .terms a[target=_blank] {
          padding-right: 23px;
          background-image: url(https://theme.zdassets.com/theme_assets/1251968/005bc4945e41a6953e71bba2758fc27bb6593f17.svg);
          background-size: 16px;
          background-position: 100%;
          background-repeat: no-repeat;
      }
      a {
          color: #003c88;
      }

      /**************** typo style ****************/
      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
        line-height: 120%;
        font-family: ShellFutura, Arial, sans-serif;
        font-weight: normal;
      }

      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p {
        margin: 0 0 1rem;
      }

      h1 {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: #0097bb;
      }

      .text-bold {
        font-weight: bold;
      }

      .text-bold {
        font-weight: bold;
      }

      .text-link {
        color: #003c88;
      }

      .text-link:hover, .text-link:active {
        color: #0a274d;
      }

      .icon-container {
        padding-left: 7px;
        white-space: nowrap;
        color: #003C88;
      }

      .optional {
        display:inline;
        font-size: 1px;
        padding-left: 0px;
        font-weight: normal;

      }
      .optional {
        display:inline;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: normal;

      }
/**************** alesrt style ****************/
        .alert-center {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 620px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 0.178rem 0;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .form-alert {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        min-height: calc(100vh - 13rem);
      }

/**************** banner style ****************/

    display: -webkit-box;

    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;

          </p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
<!-- Banner section -->

<div id="questionnaire_banner">
  <div id="questionnaire" class="container-lg px-4 px-sm-4 px-xl-5">
    <form name="formularz" id="cloudPage" name="cloudPage" action="" method="post">
      <input type="hidden" name ="billingAccountId" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="subscriberKey" value = "">
      <input type="hidden" name ="externalAccountId" value = "">
        <!-- Form 1 -->

        <div id="form">
          <div class="form-paragraph">
          <h2 class="title">
          Register your interest
          </h2>
          <p class="">
          We’re going back to offering great fixed tariffs just as soon as we can. Register your interest here.
          </p>
            </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Firstname">
            <p class="customerinfo">First name</p>
            <input name="Firstname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your first name">
            <span id="FirstNameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid first name</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Surname">
            <p class="customerinfo">Last name</p>
            <input name="Surname" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your last name">
              <span id="SurnameError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid last name</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="ContactPreference">
            <p class="customerinfo">
              How would you like to hear from us?
            </p>
            <div class="radiobox">
            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="email"  onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Email
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>

            <label class="answer_container_radio">
              <input type="radio" class="ContactPreferenceAnswer" name="ContactPreference" value="phone" onclick="toggleQuestionThree()"> Phone call
              <span class="checkmark_radio"></span>
            </label>
          </div>
            <span id="ContactPreferenceError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">This field is required</span>
          </div>
          <div class="form-checkbox" id="Phone" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Phone</p>
            <input name="Phone" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your phone number">
            <span id="PhoneError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid phone number</span>
          </div>

          <div class="form-checkbox" id="EmailAddress" style="display: none;">
            <p class="customerinfo">Email address</p>
            <input name="EmailAddress" class="answer_box" placeholder="Enter your email address">
            <span id="EmailAddressError" class="error-message" style="display: none;">Please enter a valid email address</span>
          </div>
          <input name="submitted" type="hidden" value="true"><br>
          <button class="button" id="Submit" type="submit" value="Submit" name="submit">Submit</button>
      <div class="terms">
        <p class="terms">
          Your email address and phone number will only be used to communicate with you regarding our current tariffs. You can unsubscribe at any time.
         
           See our  <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/terms/energy/domestic"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
        energy terms and conditions</a> and our <a style="color: #003C88; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/privacy"  target="_blank" rel="noopener";>
           privacy policy</a> for more information.
            <!-- <span class="icon-container">
              <svg width="18px" height="18px" viewBox="0 0 18 18">
                <g stroke="none" strokewidth="1" fillrule="evenodd">
                    <g transform="translate(-140.000000, -197.000000)">
                    <g transform="translate(140.000000, 197.000000)">
                        <g>
                        <path d="M4.9506,10.4988 C4.8306,10.4988 4.7172,10.452 4.6326,10.3668 C4.4574,10.1916 4.4574,9.906 4.6326,9.7302 L12.8646,1.4982 L9.9012,1.4982 C9.6528,1.4982 9.4512,1.2966 9.4512,1.0482 C9.4512,0.7998 9.6528,0.5982 9.9012,0.5982 L13.9512,0.5982 C14.0046,0.5982 14.0568,0.6078 14.1078,0.627 C14.1144,0.6294 14.121,0.6318 14.127,0.6342 C14.2326,0.6774 14.3214,0.7668 14.367,0.8766 C14.3688,0.8814 14.3712,0.8868 14.373,0.8922 C14.3916,0.9408 14.4012,0.9942 14.4012,1.0482 L14.4012,5.0982 C14.4012,5.3466 14.1996,5.5482 13.9512,5.5482 C13.7028,5.5482 13.5012,5.3466 13.5012,5.0982 L13.5012,2.1354 L5.2692,10.3674 C5.184,10.452 5.0706,10.4988 4.9506,10.4988 Z" id="Path"></path>
                        <path d="M1.3506,14.9988 C0.606,14.9988 0.0006,14.3934 0.0006,13.6488 L0.0006,4.6488 C0.0006,3.9042 0.606,3.2988 1.3506,3.2988 L6.7506,3.2988 C6.999,3.2988 7.2006,3.5004 7.2006,3.7488 C7.2006,3.9972 6.999,4.1988 6.7506,4.1988 L1.3506,4.1988 C1.1022,4.1988 0.9006,4.4004 0.9006,4.6488 L0.9006,13.6488 C0.9006,13.8972 1.1022,14.0988 1.3506,14.0988 L10.3506,14.0988 C10.599,14.0988 10.8006,13.8972 10.8006,13.6488 L10.8006,8.2488 C10.8006,8.0004 11.0022,7.7988 11.2506,7.7988 C11.499,7.7988 11.7006,8.0004 11.7006,8.2488 L11.7006,13.6488 C11.7006,14.3934 11.0952,14.9988 10.3506,14.9988 L1.3506,14.9988 Z" id="Path"></path>
                        </g>
                    </g>
                    </g>
                </g>
              </svg>
            </span> -->
          
        </p>
      </div>
    </form>
    <div id="thankYou" style="display: none;">
      Thank you for your feedback!
    </div>


    <script type="text/javascript">

  function isValidFirstname(firstname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(firstname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidSurname(surname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(surname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidEmail(email) {
    const re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
    return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidPhoneNumber(phone) {
    const re = /^[\+]?[(]?[0-9]{3}[)]?[-\s\.]?[0-9]{3}[-\s\.]?[0-9]{4,6}$/im;
    return re.test(phone);
  };

  function toggleQuestionThree() {
    var ContactPreferenceValue = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'email') {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'phone') {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

  }

  function isValidForm() {

    var ContactPreferenceObject = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceObject === null) {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var EmailAddressObject = document.querySelector('input[name="EmailAddress"]');

    if (isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var PhoneObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Phone"]');

    if (isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var FirstnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Firstname"]');

    if (isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var SurnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Surname"]');

    if (isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var validEmailCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'email' && isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === true;
    var validPhoneCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'phone' && isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === true;
    var validFirstNameCheck = isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === true;
    var validSurnameCheck = isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === true;

    if ((validEmailCheck || validPhoneCheck) && validFirstNameCheck && validSurnameCheck) {
      return true;
    }

    return false;
  }

  document.getElementById('cloudPage').onsubmit = function() {
    return isValidForm();
  };

  </script>
  </div>
</div>




<div class="footer">
   © 2010 - 2022 Shell Energy Retail Limited
</div>
</body>
</html>

    }

/* Radio Buttons */

/* Customize the label (the container) */
    .radiobox {
      display: flex;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      margin-top: 1rem;
      margin-right: 1rem;

    }
    .answer_container_radio {
      display: inline;
      flex-direction: row;
      align-items: center;
      min-height: 30px;
      position: relative;
      padding-left: 35px;
      padding-right: 1rem;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      cursor: pointer;
      text-align: middle;
      font-size: 1rem;
      -webkit-user-select: none;
      -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
      user-select: none;
      }

/* Hide the browser's default radio button */
    .answer_container_radio input {
      position: absolute;
      opacity: 0;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
/* Create a custom radio button */

      .checkmark_radio {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;
      }

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked ~ .checkmark_radio {
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #0097bb;
        /* -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); */
      }

      /* Create the indicator (the dot/circle - hidden when not checked) */
      .checkmark_radio :after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
      }

      /* Style the indicator (dot/circle) */
      .answer_container_radio input:checked  ~ .checkmark_radio:after {
        display: block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 6px;
        left: 6.1px;
        width: 16.1px;
        height: 16.1px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #0097bb;
        content: '';
      }

  /* radio buttons end */

      .answer_container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
        min-height: 30px;
        /* display: block; */
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 40px;
        padding-right: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: middle;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -moz-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;
      }

      /* Hide the browser's default checkbox */
      .answer_container input {
        position: absolute;
        opacity: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      /* Create a custom checkbox */
      .checkmark {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        height: 30px;
        width: 30px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border: 1px solid #a6a6a6;

      }

      /* On mouse-over, add a grey background color */
      /* .answer_container:hover input ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #ececec;
      } */

      /* When the radio button is checked, add a blue background */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark {
        background-color: #0097bb;
        border: 2px solid rgb(59,153,252);
      }

      /* Check mark */
      .checkmark:after {
        position: absolute;
        display: none;
        content: '';
      }

      /* Show check mark */
      .answer_container input:checked ~ .checkmark:after {
        display: block;
      }

      /* Checkbox tick */
      .answer_container .checkmark:after {
        top: 4px;
        left: 8px;
        width: 9px;
        height: 12px;
        transform: rotate(45deg);
        border: solid #ffffff;
        border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
      }

      /* Disabled tick colour */
      .answer_container input:disabled ~ .checkmark:after {
        border-color: #7b7b7b;
      }

        </p>
      </div>
    </form>
    <div id="thankYou" style="display: none;">
      Thank you for your feedback!
    </div>


    <script type="text/javascript">

  function isValidFirstname(firstname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(firstname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidSurname(surname) {
    const re = /^[A-Za-z\-\'\ ]{2,30}$/;
    return re.test(String(surname).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidEmail(email) {
    const re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
    return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
  };

  function isValidPhoneNumber(phone) {
    const re = /^[\+]?[(]?[0-9]{3}[)]?[-\s\.]?[0-9]{3}[-\s\.]?[0-9]{4,6}$/im;
    return re.test(phone);
  };

  function toggleQuestionThree() {
    var ContactPreferenceValue = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'email') {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    if (ContactPreferenceValue.value === 'phone') {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

  }

  function isValidForm() {

    var ContactPreferenceObject = document.querySelector('input[name="ContactPreference"]:checked');

    if (ContactPreferenceObject === null) {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('ContactPreference').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('ContactPreferenceError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var EmailAddressObject = document.querySelector('input[name="EmailAddress"]');

    if (isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('EmailAddress').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('EmailAddressError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var PhoneObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Phone"]');

    if (isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Phone').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('PhoneError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var FirstnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Firstname"]');

    if (isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Firstname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('FirstNameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var SurnameObject = document.querySelector('input[name="Surname"]');

    if (isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === false) {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.add("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      document.getElementById('Surname').classList.remove("error");
      document.getElementById('SurnameError').style.display = 'none';
    }

    var validEmailCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'email' && isValidEmail(EmailAddressObject.value) === true;
    var validPhoneCheck = ContactPreferenceObject !== null && ContactPreferenceObject.value === 'phone' && isValidPhoneNumber(PhoneObject.value) === true;
    var validFirstNameCheck = isValidFirstname(FirstnameObject.value) === true;
    var validSurnameCheck = isValidSurname(SurnameObject.value) === true;

    if ((validEmailCheck || validPhoneCheck) && validFirstNameCheck && validSurnameCheck) {
      return true;
    }

    return false;
  }

  document.getElementById('cloudPage').onsubmit = function() {
    return isValidForm();
  };

  </script>
  </div>
</div>




<div class="footer">

</div>
</body>
</html>
